steps.content: Voltage Finance is a platform that provides a range of DeFi tools that can be accessed easily on any smart device. One of the main features of Voltage Finance is its Automated Market Maker (AMM) exchange. This allows users to trade between different tokens using an automated system, making the process quick and efficient. Another feature offered by Voltage Finance is Liquidity Pools. Users can stake LP tokens into Farms and in return, they can earn VOLT and wFUSE tokens. This provides an opportunity for users to earn passive income by providing liquidity to the platform. Yield Farming is another option available on Voltage Finance. Users can stake their VOLT tokens and receive veVOLT tokens. These veVOLT tokens not only grant governance power to the users but also entitle them to a share of the revenue generated by Voltage, which is distributed in VOLT. This allows users to participate in the platform's growth and earn rewards. Additionally, Voltage Finance offers the option to stake FUSE with liquid staking (sFUSE). By staking FUSE, users can benefit from a high Annual Percentage Yield (APY) in FUSE. This feature also provides the opportunity for auto-compounding, which means that users can continuously reinvest their earnings to maximize their returns. Moreover, staked tokens can be used to participate in other DeFi opportunities within the Voltage Finance ecosystem. In summary, Voltage Finance provides a range of DeFi tools that can be accessed easily on any smart device. Users can trade between tokens using the AMM exchange, earn rewards through Liquidity Pools, participate in Yield Farming to earn governance power and revenue shares, and stake FUSE for high APY and auto-compounding benefits. These features offer users the opportunity to grow their assets, earn passive income, and actively participate in the DeFi ecosystem.

steps.content: Yield farming on Voltage DEX is a process that allows you to earn VOLT token rewards by providing liquidity to the platform. To get started, you need to search and select two tokens that you want to pool together. For example, you can choose FUSE and FUSD. Once you have selected the tokens, go to the Farm page and choose the same Farm that you entered in the pool. In this case, it would be the FUSE + FUSD Farm. By doing this, you are staking your LP (Liquidity Provider) tokens in the farm. To receive your VOLT token rewards, you need to select the claim button on the withdraw tab. The VOLT token rewards are updated every few seconds, so you can claim them periodically. If you want to unstake your LP tokens, you can navigate to the withdraw tab under the farm and select withdraw at the bottom of the panel. This will allow you to remove your liquidity from the farm. To find the corresponding pool, go to the Pools page on the left toolbar. Here, you can search for and select the pool that matches the tokens you have pooled together. Yield farming on Voltage DEX is a great way to earn VOLT token rewards by providing liquidity to the platform. By following these steps, you can start yield farming and maximize your earnings. Remember to connect and confirm your wallet before you begin the process.

steps.content: sFUSE and Liquid Staking are concepts related to the Fuse Network, a blockchain platform. Liquid staking refers to a model where users can stake their Fuse tokens and earn rewards. Staking is similar to putting your money in a savings account, where you can earn interest over time. In this case, when you stake your Fuse tokens, you receive sFUSE tokens as placeholders or receipts. The value of your sFUSE tokens increases as long as you keep your Fuse tokens staked. For example, if you stake 1000 FUSE tokens, you would receive 1000 sFUSE tokens. If you keep your tokens staked for a week, the value of your sFUSE tokens will go up. When you decide to withdraw or unstake your FUSE tokens, you can exchange your sFUSE tokens for a higher amount of FUSE tokens, depending on the current rate. To participate in liquid staking, you can follow a simple process. First, you need to go to the Voltage Finance website and access the "Stake" tab. Then, choose sFUSE as the type of token you want to stake and enter the amount of Fuse tokens you wish to stake. Confirm the transaction in your wallet, and you will start earning rewards. The approximate Annual Percentage Yield (APY) for your stake will be shown. It's important to note that the APY is dynamic and may change slightly. The liquid staking contract automatically compounds the rewards each time a user stakes or unstakes into the pool. To unstake your tokens, you can select the "Unstake" option and enter the amount you wish to withdraw. Sign the transaction in your wallet, and you will receive your unstaked tokens. To monitor your staking activity, you can access the Analytics section on the platform. This will provide you with information about your staked tokens and the rewards you have earned. It's worth mentioning that the value of your staked tokens may increase over time, but it's important to keep them staked for a certain period to maximize your rewards. If you unstake too soon, you may not see much increase in value. Overall, sFUSE and Liquid Staking on the Fuse Network offer users an opportunity to earn rewards by staking their Fuse tokens. It's a simple process that resembles putting money in a savings account, where the value of your staked tokens can grow over time. By following the instructions provided on the Voltage Finance platform, users can easily participate in liquid staking and start earning rewards.

steps.content: Voltage Launchpad is the first-ever token launch platform on the Fuse Network. It serves as a gateway for projects looking to join the growing Fuse ecosystem. The platform operates in a phased approach, with three distinct phases: Deposit, Withdrawal, and Launch. Each phase plays a crucial role in the token launch process. In the Deposit phase, users can stake their $VOLT tokens to increase their allocation size. By staking their tokens, users show their support for the platform and are rewarded with a larger allocation. The amount of allocation is determined by the user's veVOLT balance, which is a snapshot taken a few days before the official launch. Users without veVOLT will receive a lower allocation compared to those who hold veVOLT. The Withdrawal phase allows users to withdraw the tokens they have purchased. During this phase, users have the opportunity to adjust their VOLT stake if they are unhappy with the TOKEN-VOLT pairing ratio. However, penalties are in place to discourage rate manipulation. The final phase is the Launch phase, which lasts for seven days. During this phase, users can trade their VOLT tokens for the Launchpad's token, up to their pre-defined allocation. These tokens will be locked for a short period until trading starts. There are several advantages to using the Voltage Launchpad. Firstly, it provides efficient price discovery, allowing users to potentially achieve significant gains by staking VOLT tokens and actively participating in the launch. Secondly, the phased approach ensures a fair distribution of new tokens to all participants. The token launch process is also transparent and auditable, reflecting a commitment to integrity. Additionally, by depositing tokens into a liquidity pair on the Voltage Finance DEX, liquidity for all newly issued tokens is ensured. Lastly, users have the opportunity to earn bonus tokens throughout the launch, incentivizing their participation. Overall, the Voltage Launchpad serves as a catalyst for innovation in the Fuse DeFi ecosystem. It provides a platform for emerging projects to secure funding and connects them with an active community eager to support and benefit from early-stage ventures. By bridging visionary projects with the community, the Launchpad propels the future of DeFi and empowers its members to experience hypergrowth.

To achieve this, Voltage Finance has laid out a roadmap that includes several exciting innovations.

One of the major updates coming to Voltage Finance is the introduction of Voltage v3, a new version of their decentralized exchange (DEX). This upgrade will bring customizable liquidity ranges to the platform, allowing users to earn more through fees and boosted pool incentives. Traders will also have greater control over their trades and slippage within specific price ranges, thanks to the ability to concentrate liquidity. The Beta version of Voltage v3 is almost ready for testing, which is an exciting milestone for the community.

Holders of sFUSE, the native token of Voltage Finance, will be able to use it as collateral to borrow other assets while earning staking rewards. More information about the lending release will be shared in the coming month.

In addition to these updates, Voltage Finance is focused on enhancing the user experience and introducing new DeFi opportunities. They have plans for a tokenomics upgrade, listing on top-tier centralized exchanges, boosted incentives for VeVolt holders, stable yield on real-world assets, an advanced pro mode in the Volt app, expanded onramps, and seamless onboarding, a dynamic liquid staking market, gamified quests feature, collaborative trading strategies with revenue share, and a comprehensive bug bounty program.

Overall, Voltage Finance has an exciting roadmap for 2024 that aims to bring significant advancements to the platform. With their focus on liquidity, user experience, and new DeFi opportunities, Voltage Finance is poised for growth and success in the coming year.
